ygData.subject: Re: Has this ever happened to you?? and what can you do when it does
ygData.msgSnippet: One problem with the war is it can screw up the zone until the server is reset.  They have patched it but it still breaks, though less often.  But it is fun!
ygData.messageBody:
One problem with the war is it can screw up the zone until the server
is reset. They have patched it but it still breaks, though less
often. But it is fun!

If you want to increase your brewing cheaply just gather Payala fruit
in Shadeweaver Thicket and combine it with water. It's a ground drop
so anyone can find it. Just look for the blue topped trees. It
makes Shar Val essence, triv at 180+.

> >

> > Each camp has a trigger, for the grimling camp in the south its
the
> Grimling

the enemy
> to
> > attack them. The war moves in one direction...the mobs
controling the
> north
> > cave always attacks the south camp, south camp always attacks the
east
> cave,

want in

then
> > trigger them to attack the one you want them at. Once a mob
controls 2

in the

> > under attack. The substances you want will drop off the owlbears
and
> sonic
> > wolves once they take the south camp area, rarely they drop off
the others

every
> other
> > kill. The wolves drop Shrieking substances, looks like a blueish
green
> > rock, and the owlbears drop wailing substances, looks like an
orange orb.
> > Combine 1 each of the substances with the hammer, anvil, one
metal ring,
> and
> > water to make the orb, then combine the right number of orbs,
swirling
> > shadows, and mold to make shadowscream armor.
